name: Colt Wesley
description:
COLT WESLEY

This game was created for #100 Dollar Prize Week Jam of cowboy8625.

The game is about an old Cowboy Gun Cyborg (Colt Wesley) who has a lot of good tasty beers that even Robots wants to get them all. 

The gameplay is very simple. Just assemble Colt Wesley and use the space bar to shoot take note because Colt Wesley is tool old you need to reassemble him every time you fire and every kill will increase the aggression of the robots.

CONTROLS:

  • MOUSE - DRAG 
  • SPACE - SHOOT

ENJOY!!!
